parent_collections.title: Protocol collection - "Glucocerebrosidase is imported into mitochondria and preserves complex I integrity and energy metabolism"

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"72kqr","text":"Prepare nucleofection solution: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8l9mo","text":"      Human Dermal   Fibroblast Nucleofector solution  82 µL     Supplement  18 µl     Plasmid  10 µg   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":104}],"data":{}},{"key":"3u6i3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["294",48],"data":[["Human Dermal Fibroblast Nucleofector solution","82 µL\u0026nbsp;"],["Supplement","18 µl\u0026nbsp;"],["Plasmid","10 µg\u0026nbsp;"]],"guid":"E0BBA297C51C11EC97780A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Human Dermal Fibroblast Nucleofector solution","82 µL\u0026nbsp;"],["Supplement","18 µl\u0026nbsp;"],["Plasmid","10 µg\u0026nbsp;"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eco6f","text":"Nucleofect 700.000 fibroblasts (resuspended in the nucleofection solution) with the P-022 program.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vgo3","text":"Distribute nucleofected fibroblasts on a 6-Well plate, coated with Matrigel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"709bc","text":"Culture cells in DMEM + GlutaMAX supplement (Gibco) + 10 % FBS (Gibco) without P/S.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"547v0","text":"Change medium to DMEM + GlutaMAX supplement + 10% FBS +   FGF2 (Peprotech) with 1% P/S (Millipore).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3a5rr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"706F7980C51D11EC9CA679B4B33C535B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1800}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bpfb","text":"Change medium to E8 medium +   Sodium Butyrate (Sigma Aldrich 303410-100G) + 0.1 % P/S and change medium every other day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"914ni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"7D3520C0C51D11EC9CA679B4B33C535B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cg7gt","text":"Pick iPS cell colonies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ep6oc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dm1ae","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"fd98t","text":"Note: First colonies should appear around Day 14.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

title: Plasmid-reprogramming of human fibroblasts
